snippet.title: Amelia - The Drought Curse (Trailer)
snippet.description:
Download (PC/Linux/Android): https://maloke.itch.io/ameliaeng

Amelia is a first-person Dark Adventure that takes place in the dry backlands of northeastern Brasil. You can freely explore the open-world village, collect items, investigate the curse, and fight for survival while being chased and haunted by an evil witch who lives in the Darkness.

This is an Indie production that took seven months to be produced remotely as a partnership between Maloke Games & Makinars Estudio.

https://maloke.itch.io/
http://www.makinars.com/

(Em Português BR): https://maloke.itch.io/ameliabr
